greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime not dividing A328316(n), with a(0) = 1 by convention; Equally, for n > 0, smallest prime dividing A328316(1+n).
comment: a(2n+1) = 2 for all n >= 0. Does the pattern of 5's in the even bisection also continue?
formula: For n >= 1, a(n) = A326810(A328316(n-1)). - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 15 2019
program: A276086(n) = { my(m=1, p=2); while(n, m *= (p^(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
A053669(n) = forprime(p=2, , if(n%p, return(p))); \\ From A053669
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 14 2019
